name: Dice Roll (Kiritoholy)
description:
hi there!

This is a game where you have to make your mind into work by just using dice roll

You have to guess the number between 1-6 and try to make the right guess if your guess is right then you have to collect the right and wrong points in your mind then divide it by how many times you played !

This game is in development it will be finished soon!

How to play!

Click on the button to select the number to guess your number then write that number into your mind and simultaneously thinking how many times you played click R button near dice to roll it again and at last divide your right numbers by how many times you played and multiply it by 100 you will get your brain prediction accuracy percentage! I will implement this in future in this gam, so you dont need to worry!
